post.body: just a random pic. Actually my wife put it up and I haven't yet mustered the enthusiasm to change it. Maybe I should keep it...
... I'm scanning for redheads :)
get a proper twitter account, then u can use all sorts of great twitter clients.
...instead, Twinkle has this useless world map thing when you try for landscape mode. Stupid Twinkle.
maybe this is the "giant iPhone" tablet thingo rumoured for ages. Something for those hanging on to their old 12"PowerBooks.
apparently there's some kind of install issue with the latest update. Google will tell u more.
it's the mystique, not the femininity, that I'm talking about.
jailbreak then install mxTube. It can download and save YouTube clips for later viewing.
if you jailbreak your iPhone you can join the Santa network too..
: yep, jailbreak only. "Five Icon Dock", via Cydia. 25% better than a normal dock {•_•}
I took my kids around Tasmania and the part they remember is the fireplace and steep stairs at a house we rented overnight :|
vegans are skinny, pale & unhealthy, wear tiedye shirts & rasta beanies, have little scraggly goatees.. or is that just in movies?
@katrinay : merlin stopped blogging GTD recently. Now he doe stuff about "creativity". 43f archives are still good though.
Another big electrical storm.. waiting for inevitable power cut
Secretly recorded another dance concert -- this time my daughter's dance. Getting better at covert movie capture. iPhone++ Cycorder++
Remembering London this time last year... a little different from the balmy tropical day I'm enjoying now. http://snipurl.com/7whvi
Secretly recorded son's dance performance, against theatre policy. Thank you, Cycorder!
Thinks today's 2 shot frappé was actually 4 shot. Caffeine jitter + start of holiday mode + MacBook anticipation = ...weird feeling.
Slightly breathless after seeing the price of the MacBook I just ordered. Clicked "confirm" anyway. Think I heard my credit card creaking.
Tks for birthday wishes, @-Xv, @tsvnq, @shilke & others.. will treat myself to a shiny new MacBook.
convinced fave cafe to make frappes a different way. Now they're great. City Life cafe at Urban Quarter - ask for a "Danielle Special"
Got my first ever birthday card with a joke about being old.
Ergons says power is out in "Townsville, Charters Towers, Ingham and surrounding districts". Big. Watching iPhone's battery bar anxiously.
Power out -- over most of the city, the twitterverse tells me. Not yet 7 am and already uncomfortably warm. Stupid tropics.
High School Musical 3 mini review: like the first two HSMs, it's so clean and wholesome it's like Mormons made it.
things that make jailbreaking your iPhone worth it, #3: SBSettings. WiFi/3G on/off & adjust brightness without closing the current app.
30 C and humidity at kids learn-to-swim lessons 100%. Sweaty!
Things that make jailbreaking iPhone worth it, #2: Cycorder. Record video with your iPhone camera. It's what your cam was born to do.
Last chance to donate to my awesome moustache + Wolverine chops: http://tinyurl.com/56ypu4 (pic: http://tinyurl.com/6xpb5o )
Things that make jailbreaking iPhone worth it, #1: mxTube. Downloads YouTube vids for watching offline.
Ping
MacBook arrived. Package tracking fail (invisible after Shanghai > Sydney). Also, had nice brunch with Laura and The Amazing Rob.
Relaxing with a scotch'n'dry and episode 7 of True Blood (I went to the sTORe to RENT it)
Twilight minireview: Romance = minimal plot = can fit whole book into one movie. Easier to like the characters than when reading the book.
Twitterfon is //fast//. WTF is Twinkle doing with all this additional CPU cycles?
Testing twitterfon. Hmmm
New keyboard and software arrived. Still waiting on my MacBook though.
Twitter and Facebook are eroding away my "feminine mystique"
Crap memory + moving for yr 12 = barely remembers anyone from high school, but nonetheless considering the 2010 reunion.
Happy New Etcetera. Americans and others living in the timezone past: so far, nothing weird appears to happen in 2009.
Last post ever from Twinkle iPhone client. Rock-to-suck ratio just not high enough. 100% Twitterfon from now on.
Sizzler: mediocre food, great for kids
Xmas Dr Who episode pretty good, like all eps featuring cybermen.
Note carrier -- I'm on the 'santa' network http://snipurl.com/93kuz
Christmas lunch -- completion level 90% and rising http://snipurl.com/93g15
Ceramic knives are kinda scary -- they look exactly like plastic toy knives, but AREN'T. Brrrrrr...
Wait, it's Christmas? O noes! I haven't bought any presents yet!
Got a Real Man to come by and fix leaking cistern. When a giant EMP kills all electronics, I'll probably starve to death a week later.
recommendations for mac desktop twitter clients? everyone's claiming theirs is the best...
Tried to fix small leak in my toilet's refill pipe. Now I have a medium size leak in my toilet's refill pipe.
Wrapping the last of the hogswatch presents.
